description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Checkout' that presents a checkout page for an e-commerce platform. It displays the cart items, total cost, and handles order placement by interacting with an external OrdersAPI service.

methods.name: Checkout (function component)
methods.description: React functional component rendering the checkout page, managing state for order placement and messages.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: Async handler function triggered when user clicks 'Place order' button; calls external API to checkout and updates UI based on success or failure.
